original_title: Merle Haggard: Salute to a Country Legend
overview: Captures the most iconic moments from a one-night-only concert event honoring Merle Haggard and his music on what would have been his 80th birthday. Packed with captivating live performances, never-before-seen interviews and exclusive behind-the-scenes footage with some of musicâ€™s biggest superstars.
title: Merle Haggard: Salute to a Country Legend
